name: Foghorn Harbor Inn Hotel

reviews.title: Pleasant family hotel nr. LA with shuttle transfers
reviews.text: Beautifully situated right on a safe childrens beach facing marina - a bay view room is a must.Also, make sure that you do not get a room too near the reception as you can hear the phone ringing etc, but it did not disturb us during the night. Upstairs rooms with balcony are best but downstairs rooms provide immediate access to beach - however people who walk past look into your "private" windowed patio as if into a goldfish bowl - they can't help themselves! ( hence upstairs is best.)Room furniture pleasant with air con, fridge and microwave and free coffee and hot water always available in reception, along with plastic cutlery if you bought any food to microwave from the excellently well stocked adjacent shop. A fly screened balcony door was appreciated.Free breakfast was self service in polystyrene and plastic - but hey, there was lots of choice and it was free!Free video library also appreciated and an excellent idea.Female staff and young man all very pleasant and helpful - just an older man needed a course in PR we thought.Need to book to eat at The Cheesecake Factory or be prepared to wait - this restaurant even has valet parking! You can walk nextdoor to it from this hotel though. Eddie's diner just beyond Jamaica Inn was quiet and good value.You can walk to famous Venice Beach - time it for the sunset from the pier - great! You also walk past the Venice canals on the way which are quite pretty.We felt safe here and would visit again on a stop over between NZ and UK. Free shuttle transfer by "Coast Shuttle" on request too.
Skip this one unless you like rude hosts.
reviews.title: Rude People

reviews.text: We loved this little hotel (30 rooms) which we selected for our family reunion. This is an older establishment which has been recently updated. We rented 4 rooms (rooms 103, 106, 107, 108) and each has it's own enclosed patio which overlooks the beach and the boats in the marina. The front desk staff was very friendly and accomodating. The clean beach is a well maintained city park which has volley ball nets, covered picnic tables and play ground equipment for the little ones in the family. here are lifeguards for a roped off swiming area.There is a very nice walking path which goes around the beach and the upscale marina. Each room had a 27 inch wall mounted flat screen LCD TV, refrig and microwave oven . Our rooms were very quiet and the beds (two Queens) comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was average consisting of waffels, yogurt, boiled eggs, assorted cold cereals, juices, coffee and variety of pastries. No pets are allowed. We found this to be the best deal in the area costing $159/room (4 persons/room) and conveintly located.
reviews.title: Loved the Foghorn Inn on the Beach

reviews.text: This hotel is close to Venice Beach and next door to a Cheesecake Factory (yummy) and a sandwich/liquor store. Parking is free.
reviews.title: A Gem of a Place!

likes.disliked: — Free Internet Access that was broken while we were there.

reviews.text: The marina area is frequently patrolled by police (at least every hour) which kept the riff raff out of the area.
reviews.title: Everything is fine!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My tip to you be to rent a bike at Venice Beach (by the pier) and ride to Santa Monica Beach. (about 1 mile one way) Cost $6/hour, great views of beach, good shopping and eateries along the way. Great place to people watch. Have fun!
reviews.title: excellant hotel and friendly staff

reviews.text: Our family stayed at Foghorn for 3 days and found the motel basic but clean. Rooms were a little small and only double size beds but OK. The breakfast provided was excellent and the outlook from the room (upstairs is the best) great. Beach volleyball outside your room and balls provided by the motel. The staff here were exceptional, giving us plenty of advise and directions and willing to give us all the time needed for this. Nothing was a problem for them. Great position (safe) easy access to Venice Beach and surrounds. Would recommend this motel just for the great staff.
reviews.title: Friendly place to stay

reviews.text: My husband and I stayed at the Foghorn for one night. The room was basic but clean.
reviews.title: Clean hotel - Reasonably Priced

reviews.text: There is a liquor store right there and a restaurant within walking distance. The hotel is right on the beach. You can walk out the patio door and you are in a bay where lots of boats are docked. I'm sure in the summer the area is very busy. There are volleyball nets set up and it looks like a big picnic area.
reviews.title: A great stay!
Good Safe Place
reviews.text: The staff were nice and very helpful. I checked many hotels in the area and this was the most reasonably priced.

aka: Foghorn Harbor Hotel Marina Del Rey
description: Small, friendly, but big on details. "Diamond in the rough". Great location & finest city & Marina views. Cheesecake Factory Restaurant next door (package available). Close to Venice Boardwalk. Extensive complimentary continental breakfast, 7:00 am to 10:00 am. Coffee in lobby 24/7 with snacks. Free shuttle from LAX, on-site parking,free WiFi in all rooms, DVD's & desk-top computer with printer in lobby.
